name: bet365_upcoming_events
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool betsapi.
Tool description: bet365 events/scores/stats/odds
API description: Retrieves upcoming sports events from Bet365 based on the given parameters.

sport_id.description: The ID of the sport to get upcoming events for.

day.description: The specific day to get events for. Defaults to None.

league_id.description: The ID of the league to filter events. Defaults to None.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to None.
